plot: A woman becomes depressed when the man she loves chooses her rival for his heart to be his wife. She consoles herself with the fact that they still live in the same city and she may have the opportunity to steal him away from his wife
title: Ulryeogo naega watdeonga
plot_es: A woman becomes depressed when the man she loves chooses her rival for his heart to be his wife. She consoles herself with the fact that they still live in the same city and she may have the opportunity to steal him away from his wife
plot_en: A woman becomes depressed when the man she loves chooses her rival for his heart to be his wife. She consoles herself with the fact that they still live in the same city and she may have the opportunity to steal him away from his wife
